title: Fun Upbeat Loops
description: This pack contains 12 cheerful and quirky background music loops, created to accompany projects that require fun, positive, and upbeat feel to them.
longDescription: This loop pack was created with FUN in mind! The choice of instruments, and their combinations were made to instantly deliver that comic and upbeat feel, needed for your project. We could definitely imagine it being used during the gameplay or in the main menu of a puzzle, arcade, RPG, or any kind of kids-friendly game! Of course it's suitable for wide variety of different uses, and not necessarily tied to game development projects.
technicalDetails:
Preview available on our official SoundCloud channel here:

https://soundcloud.com/cyberwave-orchestra/sets/fun-upbeat-loops-pack


Features:

12 HQ Wav Audio Loops:

  • Adventure Game (1:44)
  • Comedy Inspiration (0:48)
  • Friendly Town (0:54)
  • Fun Background (0:54)
  • Game Background (2:33)
  • Happy Runner (1:13)
  • Kids Game (2:07)
  • Positive Spirit (1:45)
  • Puzzle Game (2:27)
  • Quirky Background (1:43)
  • Upbeat Background (2:33)
  • Upbeat Spy Mission (1:36)


Number of Audio Wavs: 12

Number of Audio Cues: 12

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 20:23 min

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes


Thank you!
